The TTIP and CETA are Jewish hegemony projects to enslave the rest of Europe.
Jews who are already in full control of USA, Canada and Britain now are very closed to scam us all.
CETA is a TTIP in disguise.
And not to forget TISA, for Trade in Services Agreement with the USA.
Only Jews will profit from this scams.
